title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description:
Detailed requirements gathering for the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system has been initiated. This includes:
- Clarification on input data sources and expected outputs
- Performance requirements (response time, throughput, and latency)
- Security considerations (data encryption, access control, and secure data transfer)
- Data privacy and compliance requirements (GDPR, CCPA) and clarification on how to handle sensitive data securely
- Scalability and fault tolerance requirements (ability to handle large volumes of data, recover from failures, and maintain performance under high loads)
- Any other relevant constraints and potential use cases or edge cases that may impact the design or functionality of the system

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system, including components, data flow, and interfaces between modules.

title: Implement Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Develop components for ingesting and preprocessing the anonymous feedback data, handling various input formats and cleaning/normalizing the data for further analysis.

title: Develop Theme Clustering Algorithm
description: Implement the core algorithm for identifying common themes and priorities from the preprocessed feedback data, using techniques such as natural language processing, topic modeling, and clustering.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system, allowing users to view and interact with the identified themes and priorities.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management components for the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system, ensuring efficient storage and retrieval of feedback data and analysis results.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and integrate security measures and access controls to ensure the anonymity and privacy of the feedback data, as well as secure access to the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system, enabling automated testing, building, and deployment to various environments.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the system.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Prepare technical documentation for the ThemeClusterAnalyzer system, including architecture diagrams, code documentation, deployment guides, and user manuals.
